duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct patient care, assess patients' condition, and administer medication as needed.
Collaborate with healthcare team members to develop and implement patient care plans.
Advocate for patients' needs and ensure their comfort, safety, and well-being.
Administer medications, dress wounds, and monitor patient vital signs as part of routine care.
Conduct health assessments, manage pain, and provide basic patient education and support.
Utilize critical thinking skills to assess patient status and make appropriate care decisions.
Document patient care activities, maintain accurate medical records, and ensure confidentiality.
Adhere to healthcare regulations, protocols, and standards of practice in all patient interactions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing (RN) and valid state licensure
